name: Dead Man's Volley (LD #34)
description:
Tennis is much more fun when you're lobbing a dangerous magical projectile back and forth!

Part rhythm game, part boss battle, part PONG: Dead Man's Volley gives you three battles in increasing difficulty to face. Dodge the enemy's attacks, and return their volley right back into their face!

Created for Ludum Dare #34 where it recieved 2nd place for Audio. This post-jam version is slightly modified, including calibration for controls + audio, and a significantly increased threshold for reflecting attacks. The 3rd battle isn't any easier mind, so good luck! :D
